dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: Oh hey! Wow, you actually stopped to read meâ€”how polite!

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: Most people just barge right through like they're too good for heartfelt woodland signage.

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: Press the left stick to move and O to Dash. Press R2 to run!

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: Move the right stick to move the camera.

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: But you're so smart I bet you already knew that.
